about.about-text: My name is Matias and I'm from C√≥rdoba, Argentina, I'm a frontend developer who is passioned about technology, I'm always curious about the lastest tech thing including smartphones, videogames, PC hardware, etc. I have a mindset of never stop learning so I'm always doing some courses (actually learning web3 and blockchain develoment ‚õì) and I love watching youtube videos. I like reading (Do you know Brandon Sanderson? üëÄ), and I have a Cat named Sam üêà (she's almost always on camera behind me).

experience.title: Experience
experience.freelanceText: As a freelance I worked with clients, where I had to discuss the project details, I talked about development, technologies, deployment tools, domains, etc. These experiences help me to get into the development enviroment, and then I knew that my passion is in the Frontend development.
experience.corText: At COR Global Ltd. As a Frontend developer I had the opportunity to work with a P. Manager, P. Owner, P. Designer, QA tester, Functional Analyst and also a Backend team with whom we were in constant communication. At COR I worked with Scrum, and technologies as React, TypeScript, Jest for testing, MicroFrontends.
experience.brainitText: I worked at BrainIt as a part-time FullStack developer with a small but great team, with a product that were not released yet, since my short time in BrainIT the product was changing and has a lot of changes in were we need to adapt,  moreover we were constantly looking for new technologies and innovation bringing ideas to the owner.
